# Aaron Batchelder

> Product leader, builder, and maker of things that work.

## About

Aaron Batchelder is a Director of Product at Teachable with 15+ years of experience building B2C and B2B2C products. He started as an entrepreneur in mobile (2011) and is equally comfortable with 0â†’1 products and evolving mature platforms.

## Site

This is Aaron's personal website, built as a nostalgic Classic Mac OS System 7 desktop environment. It was created collaboratively with Claude Code (Anthropic's AI coding assistant) in a single session.
